update.description:
19/08/2018: 02:30 PM Version 4.7.5.0 ==================== 1: Add Employee Daily Exp Calculate on Present Form 2: Update Some Features 3: Fixed Some Bugs 4: Improve Quality.
08/08/2018: 10:00 PM Version 4.7.0.0 ==================== 1: Update Employee Pay Roll Form 2: Add New Employee Check Box For 1st Attendence 3: Add Memory Optimization Tool 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
24/07/2018: 12:30 PM Version 4.6.1.0 ==================== 1: Fixed some bug in previous update model 2: Some Changes in Attendence Form 3: Add view button in Emp PayRoll Form 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
23/07/2018: 09:00 PM Version 4.6.0.0 ==================== 1: Add New Model in Going Attendence 2: Some Changes in Attendence Form 3: Fixed Some Bugs 4: Improve Quality.
27/06/2018: 10:00 PM Version 4.5.5.0 ==================== 1: Add Manual Date Picker in Absent Form 2: Add CPU & RAM Usages Viewer in Present Form 3: Print Directly Emp Pay Role Slip on Button Click 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
30/05/2018: 02:30 PM Version 4.5.0.0 ==================== 1: Add New Employee PayRoll Module 2: Change Some Settings 3: Change Some Security 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
16/05/2018: 04:30 PM Version 4.4.1.0 ==================== 1: Change Paramater View 2: Update History Form Add in About Tab 3: Change Default Theme to "The Bezier" 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
06/05/2018: 07:30 PM Version 4.3.1.0 ==================== 1: Employee Time Average Report New 2: Changes Report Form to Metro Form 3: Data Backup Update Setting 4: Fixed Some Bugs 5: Improve Quality.
10/04/2018: 10:00 PM Version 4.2.0.0 ==================== 1: Employee Search Form Key Change to F3 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality.
28/03/2018: 12:30 PM Version 4.1.1.0 ==================== 1: Edit Attendence Manul Form Changes 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality.
25/03/2018: 12:57 PM Version 4.0.1.0 ==================== 1: Search Form Some Changes 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality.
18/03/2018: 05:00 PM Version 4.0.0.0 ==================== 1: Some Visual Changes 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality 4: Change Application Icon 5: Change Company logo 6: Login Secreen Changes 7: Absent Form Changes
06/03/2018: 11:17 AM Version 3.5.2.0 ==================== 1: Add Icon Pic 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality.
06/03/2018: 10:58 AM Version 3.5.1.0 ==================== 1: Add Icon Pic 2: Fixed Some Bugs 3: Improve Quality.
05/03/2018: 08:31 PM Version 3.5.0.0 ==================== 1. Successfully Made Update System. 2. Some Changes In Employee Present Form. 3. Fixed Some Bugs 4: Improve Quality.
